name: Central Baptist Church
description: Baptist church providing spiritual services and community outreach including food pantry assistance. Offers Sunday worship services, Sunday School, kids ministry, student ministry, and various community support programs. Committed to making disciples and transforming the world through faith-based services.
source: Verified from official website and search results
hours_of_operation: Sunday 10:30 AM (worship), Sunday School 9:15 AM, Office hours vary
notes: Church offers food pantry services and community outreach programs. Welcomes visitors and provides various ministries for all age groups. Located in downtown Corbin.
